name: Gardening (Nanref)
description:
Description

Suddenly, the vegetative that live in the garden has become aggresive because of a strange reason and you, an ant, is the only one that can save them! Will you be able to fulfill your mission?

Fonts used:

- NOVA.

- Optimus Princeps.

- Pacifico.

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam #97.
